name: Mio Honda
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavorText:
I'm not running away again!
I'll make everyone watching us smile!

name: Miria Akagi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I like dancing, wearing cute costumes, and um… I wanna do all kinds of things!

name: Rika Jougasaki
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Music》 character, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: My dream's to be like my big sis.

name: Kirari Moroboshi
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Music》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card was placed on the stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
Happy-happy and cheerful! Otherwise, something
wonderful will get away～☆

name: Mika Jougasaki
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put a card named "TOKIMEKI Escalate" from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, if there are no markers underneath this card, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to three level 0 or lower characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them face down in any order underneath this card as markers, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Thanks, everybody-!

name: Team KBYD, Yuki
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your 《Music》 characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Are you training～?

name: Airi Totoki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by that character's soul. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Everyone～ Are you bored～?

name: new generations, Mio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [【REST】 one of your 【STAND】 《Music》 characters] When this card attacks, if a card named "Brand New Evo! Revo! Generation!" is in your climax area, and you have other cards named "new generations, Uzuki" and "new generations, Rin" in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, all of your characters cannot become 【REVERSE】, and your opponent cannot play event cards and "Backup" from hand.
flavorText:
Please listen!
We're new generations…

name: Reliable Senior, Mika
text: 【CONT】 If you have another card named "Loves Big Sis, Rika", this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText:
The Cinderella Project girls
are my cute junior colleagues-!

name: Happy Happy ☆ Kirari
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +4000 power and +1 soul.

name: Dekoration, Miria
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put this card into your memory] When a card named "LET’S GO HAPPY!!" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one card named "Dekoration, Rika", put it on the stage position that this card was on, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: It looks great on you!

name: Dekoration, Rika
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "LET’S GO HAPPY!!" is in your climax area, choose up to one card in your waiting room, return it to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText:
I'm thrilled so many
came out here today!

name: Syoko Hoshi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each marker underneath this card. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Can my shimeji watch too?

name: Taking a Step Once More, Mio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other 《Music》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Fan Letter" is in your climax area, you may choose one of your other 【REST】 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I want to continue being idols together!

name: Flying Kiss, Mika
text: 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your 《Music》 characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Aiko Takamori
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn, and at the end of turn, put this card into your memory.
flavorText: This is Aiko Takamori's Flouncy Time♪

name: Nana Abe
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets -1 level while on the stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put the top card of your stock into your waiting room. If you do, put this card into your stock.
flavorText: I'm Usamin, the singing, dancing, voice-acting idol from Planet Usamin also known as Nana Abe!

name: Loves Big Sis, Rika
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other yellow characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Reliable Senior, Mika" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Reliable Senior, Mika" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: Sis!

name: Camp with Everyone, Miria
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if all of your characters are 《Music》, you may pay the cost. If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.

name: Feeling Worried, Kirari
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: When I think that some of the girls are nervous about doing both well…

name: Popular in Class, Mio
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +2000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: If you don't come, you'll regret it!

name: Dekoration, Kirari
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 When a card named "LET’S GO HAPPY!!" is placed on your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of markers underneath this card.
flavorText:
Let's spend
a fun time together☆

name: Bad at Smiling? Producer
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: G-Grin…

name: My First Star, Miria
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to two of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get +500 power until end of turn.

name: Sanae Katagiri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put this card into your stock. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: We'll arrest you♪

name: Yuki Himekawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a climax, put this card into your waiting room. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavorText: She covers a lot of territory…!

name: Akane Hino
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: Let's do our all to make this a hot concert!

name: Yui Ohtsuki
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: What about karaoke~?

name: Mio in Summer Clothes
flavorText: I thought it'd brighten up the office!

name: Yuko Hori
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your opponent's 【REST】 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose one of your opponent's 【STAND】 characters, and 【REST】 it.
flavorText: Psychic Arrest-!

name: Gentle Big Sis, Mika
flavorText: I can be here of course, right?

name: Matching Live T-shirts, Mika
text: 【CONT】 If the number of characters you have is three or less, this card cannot be played from your hand.

name: Shizuku Oikawa
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Music》, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText:
When at crosswalks,
look right, look left, and then right once more before crossing♪

name: Unspoken Pressure
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of 《Music》 characters you have.
flavorText: Hello, Producer-san.

name: Energy Drink
text: Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, you may 【STAND】 this card."
flavorText: Chihiro: "Do your best?"

name: LET’S GO HAPPY!!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.) (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText:
We will be sure to shine
Towards the future with lots of energy!

name: Brand New Evo! Revo! Generation!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose one of your opponent's characters, and return it to your opponent's hand.) (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText:
The door to a path
is right in front of me
You too! Me too!
Everyone, C'mon!

name: TOKIMEKI Escalate
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)
flavorText:
TOKIMEKI keeps on escalating
I'm in a love mode that pops like cider

name: Fan Letter
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one yellow card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm glad I didn't quit being an idol!

name: Chihiro Senkawa
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Music》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, until end of turn, that character gets +500 power and 《Drink》. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Draw a card.
flavorText: Unless you have something else?

name: Kanako Mimura
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose up to one character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: We'll do our best for "CANDY ISLAND"!

name: Uzuki Shimamura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those card, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: Performing in a concert with everyone like this… It's like a dream!

name: Anzu Futaba
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your deck is five or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Also, we're retiring!

name: Miku Maekawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【ACT】 effect of "Our Lyrics, Miku", choose up to one card named "ΦωΦver!!" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "ΦωΦver!!" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a red card among those cards, deal one damage to your opponent. If there is a blue card among those cards, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul." (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
I'll work hard like a cat,
so please support me, nyan?

name: Chieri Ogata
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other red characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Music》 character, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled. The revealed card is returned to its original place) 【AUTO】 When a card named "Happy×2 Days" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose up to two of your red characters, until end of turn, those characters get +4000 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 from your opponent's character's 【AUTO】 effects."
flavorText: I don't have confidence in my smile… but you two gave me courage, so I want to do it together!

name: Sae Kobayakawa
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Music》 character, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: How girlish.

name: Marketing Mode, Anzu
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Result of Going All Out" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: We're CANDY ISLAND?

name: CANDY ISLAND, Chieri
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Let's sing to them together!

name: Sachiko Koshimizu
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1 level. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put the top card of your deck into your clock, and 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Although it was because I'm cute~?

name: CANDY ISLAND, Kanako
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When a card named "Happy×2 Days" is placed on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top of his or her deck."
flavorText:
That's right,
let's do what we can!

name: Our Lyrics, Miku
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Our Lyrics, Riina" [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Our Lyrics, Riina" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.) 【ACT】 [(1) Put a card named "Our Lyrics, Riina" from your stage and this card into your memory] Choose a card named "Miku Maekawa" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I want to see for myself why the producer put us together.

name: new generations, Uzuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put a 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "Brand New Evo! Revo! Generation!" is in your climax area, and you have other cards named "new generations, Mio" and "new generations, Rin" in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal three damage to your opponent. If this damage is canceled, you may put up to three cards from the top of your clock into your waiting room. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Thank you for waiting!

name: Miho Kohinata
text: 【AUTO】 [【REST】 one of your other 【STAND】 《Music》 characters and this card] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock.【【STAND】と 《Music》の間にスペースが空きすぎ】
flavorText: Ah ha ha♪

name: My First Star, Kanako
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Full of Smiles, Uzuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of your opponent's characters.

name: Strike! Miku
text: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Aspired Stage" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may choose a level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText:
I want you to promise
that we'll make our debut, nya!

name: My First Star, Chieri
text: 【CONT】 If the number of 《Music》 characters you have is two or less, this card cannot be played from your hand.

name: Mayu Sakuma
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put a character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: My First Star, Uzuki
text: 【AUTO】 When another of your red characters attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Star!!" is in your climax area, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)

name: CANDY ISLAND, Anzu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have other cards named "CANDY ISLAND, Kanako" and "CANDY ISLAND, Chieri", you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of cards named "Happy×2 Days" in your waiting room is three or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Please support "CANDY ISLAND"!

name: Relaxation Time, Anzu
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn. This card cannot 【STAND】 during your next stand phase.
flavorText: They want to work that badly… I'm impressed.

name: At Work, Producer
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Energy Drink" or "Stamina Drink" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Marshmallow Catch, Kanako
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ah~ The marshmallow…

name: ＊(Asterisk), Miku
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText: Now let's see more spirit, nya!

name: Rina Fujimoto
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
flavorText: See you~♪

name: Team KBYD, Sachiko
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Music》characters in front of this card get +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 When you level up, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Uzuki in Pajamas
flavorText: The next time we perform on stage, I want to smile all the way through!

name: Team KBYD, Sae
text: 【CONT】 If you have cards named "Team KBYD, Sachiko" and "Team KBYD, Yuki", this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
flavorText: What are you doing~?

name: Stamina Drink
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of the following effects and perform it. "Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +3500 power until end of turn." "Choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." "Search your deck for up to one card named "Energy Drink", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory."
flavorText: Chihiro: "It must be hard, working late every night."

name: Bond of new generations
text: You may put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. Choose up to one yellow character, up to one red character, and up to one blue character in your waiting room, and return them to your hand. Put this card into your clock.

name: Happy×2 Days
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
Happy×2Days
The story with you shall continue

name: ΦωΦver!!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Now, the running dreams and miracles are flashing
Embrace the gushing beat and, Yeah! Sing out loud

name: Star!!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText:
SAY☆ Shine as much as you can
Shine just like a SUPER ST@R

name: Aspired Stage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: I wanna become an idol too. I wanna make my debut!

name: Result of Going All Out
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: That's not what I was going for~!

name: Riina Tada
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: If you think it's rock, then it is!

name: Rin Shibuya
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one blue character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: But… it's not a dream.

name: Minami Nitta
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Everyone's Leader" is in your climax area, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
All right, everyone.
Let's pull out all the stops!

name: Ranko Kanzaki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "-LEGNE- Opposing Blade, Melody of Light" is in your climax area, put the top five cards of your deck into your waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (This damage may be canceled)
flavorText: As my soul takes me!

name: Anastasia
text: 【CONT】 If the number of other blue characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put another character from your stage into your waiting room] This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "My First Star, Minami" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Rukopozhatiye… Let us shake hands.

name: My First Star, Anastasia
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

name: ＊(Asterisk), Riina
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When a card named "ΦωΦver!!" is placed on your climax area, look at up to three cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.
flavorText: Follow us to the end, everyone!

name: My First Star, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Taking a Step Forward" is in your climax area, this card gets +1 level and +5500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Black Fallen Angel, Ranko
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your waiting room, if the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "White Angel, Ranko" in your waiting room, put it on the stage position that this card was on, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: White Angel, Ranko
text: 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Black Fallen Angel, Ranko" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability will not activate if this card is not on the stage at the beginning of your climax phase)

name: My First Star, Minami
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Anastasia", this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Music》 characters you have.

name: Mizuki Kawashima
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or the bottom of your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Hm?

name: Kaede Takagaki
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in the center stage, look at the top card of　your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: Heh heh heh♪

name: Cool High School Girl, Rin
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is six or more, this card gets +1500 power.

name: Koume Shirasaka
text: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one card named "Koume Shirasaka", put it on any position of your stage, shuffle your deck, and at the end of turn, put that character into your waiting room.
flavorText: So let's watch it?

name: Camp with Everyone, Anastasia
text: 【CONT】 If the number of characters your opponent has is four or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Karen Hojo
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】.
flavorText:
That Rin Shibuya girl
goes to my old middle school.

name: new generations, Rin
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Brand New Evo! Revo! Generation!" is in your climax area, and you have other cards named "new generations, Mio" and "new generations, Uzuki" in your center stage, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +5000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText:
It's hard out here in the rain,
but we'll chase those clouds away!

name: Our Lyrics, Riina
text: 【CONT】 If the number of red characters and blue characters you have is two or more for each color, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
flavorText: And I feel the same way you do.

name: LOVE LAIKA, Minami
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if a card named "Memories" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room."
flavorText: Thank you!

name: Nao Kamiya
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Wasn't that fantastic, Karen!

name: LOVE LAIKA, Anastasia
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of your other 《Music》 characters is three or more, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one card named "Memories", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 Bond/"LOVE LAIKA, Minami" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "LOVE LAIKA, Minami" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: Spasiba!

name: Chie Sasaki
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +2000 power.
flavorText: I feel like a weight's been lifted!

name: Haruna Kamijo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose another of your characters, until end of turn, that character gets +1500 power and 《Glasses》.
flavorText: Thanks to the "glasses talk"!

name: Aki Yamato
text: 【CONT】 If the number of your other characters is one or less, this card gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText:
Cutting the enemy food
supply is basic strategy.

name: Encounter with Rin, Producer
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Maybe just dip your toe in?

text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText:
In the end, the true
prince of darkness will be awakened-

name: Rock Idol, Riina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is not a 《Music》 character, put it into your clock. (If it is, return the revealed card to its original place)

name: As a Leader, Minami
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Yes!

name: Sealed Grimoire
text: Draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Choose one of your blue characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I… I would have a precious festival with servants who share my soul…

name: Mismatched Pair
text: 【COUNTER】 If the number of red characters and blue characters you have is two or more for each color, choose one of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it.
flavorText: Miku: "We're through nya!"

name: Memories
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Just before dusk, the twinkling stars
All become entwined in the ephemeral night and make me feel lonely

name: -LEGNE- Opposing Blade, Melody of Light
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText:
Here, we shall join hands
And embrace the melody which will call forth the end

name: Taking a Step Forward
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Everyone's Leader
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top or the bottom of your deck, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

name: Confirmed Debut, Anastasia
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.

name: WONDERFUL M@GIC!! Rin
text: 【CONT】 If the number of your other 《Music》 characters is three or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】 When a card named "Highest Stage" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Hanako
text: 【COUNTER】 You may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. Put this card into your memory.

name: Please! Cinderella
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
When I'm in a pinch and trying
to survive, I wanna overcome it coolly.

name: Please! Cinderella
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Smartly.

name: Please! Cinderella
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
So the magic will never end.
I believe in miracles
surrounding real skills.

name: Please! Cinderella
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Please! Cinderella.
This dream can't end as just a dream.

name: Highest Stage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (: When this card triggers, you may draw a card) (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Highest Stage
